financialSup.title: FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR REINDUSTRIALISATION AND PROMOTION OF INDUSTRIAL COMPETITIVENESS
paragraphs: HILATURAS FERRE, S.A. has developed the project “INCORPORACIÓN DE NUEVA TECNOLOGIA PARA AMPLIACIÓN DE LINEA PRODUCTIVA” with file number: RCI-040000-2016-337, financed with support from the Ministry of Industry, Trade and Tourism, within the framework of the public policy of reindustrialisation and promotion of industrial competitiveness.
